channel.title: windows on J3RN's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in windows on J3RN's Blog

item.title: #WindowsProbs
item.description: Linux is Great # It’s been a long time since I’ve used Windows - probably a few years. It’s been even longer since I legitimately cared about fixing Windows problems and didn’t instead opt for wiping the partition and doing a fresh reinstall. Trust me, I’m a Developer # As a computer scientist, naturally I run into people who confuse “developer” with “IT Professional” and ask me to fix their computers for them.
